Class Hand

java.lang.Object
blackjack.Hand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Hand extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a hand for an individual player or the dealer. It is simply an ArrayList of card objects.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aidin Miller

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card c)
      This function adds a card to the hand.
      Parameters:
      c - is the card object that will be added

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<Card> getCards()
      This function gets the cards in the hand
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of cards

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      This function gets the current value of the hand based on the cards
      Returns:
      an integer representing the total value of the hand

    • isBust

      public boolean isBust()
      This function checks to see if the hand is a bust
      Returns:
      true if the value is greater than 21, false otherwise

    • isBlackjack

      public boolean isBlackjack()
      This function checks to see if the hand is a blackjack
      Returns:
      true if the hand is a blackjack, false otherwise

    • clear

      public void clear()
      This function clears the hand

    • cardsInHand

      public int cardsInHand()
      This function represents the amount of cards in the hand.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the amount of cards in the hand
